Data Visualizer.name: Data Visualizer Project
Data Visualizer.description: A beginner-friendly project to visualize datasets using Python and data visualization libraries like Matplotlib and Seaborn.

Web Scraper.name: Web Scraping with Python
Web Scraper.description: Learn how to extract data from websites using Python and libraries like BeautifulSoup and Requests.

AI Chatbot.name: Building an AI Chatbot
AI Chatbot.description: An intermediate project to build a chatbot with NLP capabilities using Python and popular AI frameworks.

Weather App.name: Weather Application
Weather App.description: Build a weather application using Python and the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch live weather data.

Portfolio Website.name: Portfolio Website with Python
Portfolio Website.description: Create a personal portfolio website using Python frameworks like Flask or Django.

Expense Tracker.name: Expense Tracker Application
Expense Tracker.description: Create an expense tracker to manage and visualize personal expenses using Java.

Library System.name: Library Management System
Library System.description: Develop a library management application using Java to track book loans, returns, and users.

Banking App.name: Java Banking Application
Banking App.description: A Java project simulating basic banking functionalities such as deposits, withdrawals, and balance checks.

Inventory Manager.name: Inventory Management System
Inventory Manager.description: Build an inventory management system to track stock levels, sales, and orders, using Java.

E-Commerce Site.name: Building an E-commerce Site
E-Commerce Site.description: Create a fully functional e-commerce site with a cart, checkout, and payment gateway integration.
